text: is a party game in the Mario Party series. It was the seventh game in the Mario Party series, the first to be released on a handheld console. The game got mixed reviews, including a 54/100 from Metacritic and a 1/10 from Eurogamer (who called the game "a dud"). ==References== Category:2005 video games Category:Mario Party games Category:Game Boy Advance games Category:Game Boy Advance-only games
title: Mario Party Advance
